MAIN_TITLE: Is your money being used to fund climate chaos?
COUNTRY_CD: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
COUNTRY_GS: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Isl
NO_BANKS_IN_COUNTRY: No banks available in this country.
FP_DESC_1: *The fight for a habitable planet is the fight for our lives*. But while we look at ways to make our lives more sustainable, most of us are also funding environmental catastrophe.
FP_DESC_2: During the 6 years following the Paris Agreement, the world’s top 60 private-sector banks pumped $4.6 trillion into fossil fuels.
FP_DESC_3: We have the power to change our banking system because it will not change itself. Mass pressure from customers will force our banks to defund fossil fuels.
FP_DESC_4:
Bank.Green and our partners are leading a global reckoning with the world’s most powerful driver of environmental destruction.

 But we need your help.
SUBJECT: Subject
AGREE_PRIVACY: I have read and understood Bank.Green’s {0}.
THANKS_DESC: We appreciate your support in defunding fossil banks.
CHECK_EMAIL: Check your email and click the link to confirm we’ve got the right one.
BANK_RATING_WORST_TITLE: Your money is being used to fund the climate crisis at an alarming rate.
BANK_RATING_WORST_DESC: Your bank is one of the 60 biggest funders of fossil fuels in the world\*. In the 6 years since the Paris Agreement, the banks in this category have funneled $4.6 trillion into coal, oil, and gas, rapidly accelerating the climate crisis.
BANK_DETAIL_EXPLAIN_1:
While you’ve been stashing away money for a car or a weekend get-away, *{name}* has been using your savings to lend to some very questionable fossil fuel friends.

And it's not just a little here and there, we’re talking about *{total}* in the 6 years since 197 countries agreed to drastically reduce their greenhouse gas emissions in the Paris Agreement.
WHAT_CAN_YOU_DO_TITLE: What can you do to change {name}’s funding policy?
PLEASE_AGREE_TO_TERMS: You need to agree to the terms.
BANK_EXPLAIN_2_TITLE: Your bank is ignoring the Paris Agreement.
BANK_EXPLAIN_2_DESC: The Paris Agreement set the goal to stay under 1.5°C of warming for very good reasons. According to the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, an increase of just a couple of degrees more could lead to "substantial species extinction, large risks to global and regional food security", and an inability to work outside — or even live — in some areas of the world. Our world will become unrecognizable as ocean dead zones, floods, and extreme weather fuel social and economic disruption.
SORRY_NOT_LISTED: Sorry, we haven’t listed your bank yet.
THANKS_FOR_TELLING_US: Thanks, we'll let you know when we've added your bank.
PLEASE_GIVE_BANK_NAME: Please tell us the name of your bank
SORRY_NO_ETH_BANKS: Sorry, we don't have any ethical banks in this country
SORRY_NO_ETH_BANKS_DESC: We’re working hard to increase the number of banks we provide data on. If you tell us your bank’s name, we’ll email you as soon as we have a score for it.
SORRY_NO_CRITERIA_MET: Sorry, we don't have any banks that met the required filters
SORRY_NO_CRITERIA_MET_DESC: We’re working hard to increase the number of banks we provide data on. If you tell us your bank’s name, we’ll email you as soon as we have a score for it.
OTHER_SUSTAINABLE_BANKS: Other sustainable banks in your area
NOT_HAPPY_EXPLORE: Not happy with your bank’s score? Explore sustainable banks in your area.
JOIN_REDDIT_MSG: Help us build a powerful movement to demand change from climate-destroying industries by joining our Reddit community, Switch Green.
THANKS_CONTACT_DESC: We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
COUNTING_DISCLAIMER: Counting bank switches is vitally important to us as a movement. Please use this link when signing up for {name}.
THANKS_SIGNUP_LATER: Thanks, we've emailed you a link to sign up later.
BANK_RATING_BAD_TITLE: Your money is funding the climate crisis.
BANK_RATING_BAD_DESC: Your bank doesn't top the charts, but it’s still using your money to lend to fossil fuel companies and projects that are rapidly accelerating the climate crisis.
INDEX_TITLE: Find Ethical & Sustainable Banks In Your Area - Bank.Green
INDEX_DESC: Bank.Green is sounding the alarm on the climate-destroying activities of banks while recommending sustainable alternatives and empowering consumer action.
ETHICAL_BANKS_INDEX_TITLE: Find Eco Banks & Sustainable Banks In Your Area - Bank.Green
ETHICAL_BANKS_INDEX_DESC: Find and compare the service offerings of ethical and sustainable banks.
FAQ_DESC: Do you have questions about your bank's climate impacts, Bank.Green's mission or how to switch banks? Here's where you can find the answers.
CONTACT_DESC: Unfortunately we are not currently accepting requests to research new banks, but we encourage you to reach out to your own bank to establish whether or not they are financing fossil fuels.
BANK_RATING_OK_BIMPACT_DESC: The good news is that your bank passed a B Impact Assessment\* and is doing more for the environment than most other banks. The bad news is that it may *still be funding fossil fuels,* and the team at Bank.Green wasn’t able to confirm that it’s not. As a customer, you have the power to find out for sure – and we’d like to help you. *To take positive action, keep on scrolling…*
BANK_RATING_OK_FAIRFINANCE_DESC:
The good news is that your bank is better than most of the banks rated by Fair Finance International.\* The bad news is that it may *still be funding fossil fuels,* worker exploitation, tax avoidance, armaments, or coal mining, and the team at Bank.Green wasn’t able to confirm that it’s not.

Your bank has started to clean up its funding activities, which means it will listen to you. *To take positive action, keep on scrolling…*
BANK_RATING_OK_DESC:
The good news is that your bank is not a leading fossil fuel funder and we have found positive evidence that they care about the environment. The bad news is that *we haven’t yet been able to confirm for certain that they do not fund fossil fuels.*

Since your bank is showing themselves to be socially responsible, it’s time to make sure they know that fossil fuel funding is no longer socially acceptable. *To take positive action, keep on scrolling…*
BANK_DETAIL_OK_SIGNUP: Sign up to Bank.Green. We'll take the fight to the banks together.
FIRST_NAME_PLACEHOLDER: First name, so we can say hi
NOT_LISTED: We’re working hard to increase the number of banks we provide data on. If you {0}, we’ll try to include it as soon as possible. In the meantime, we encourage you to consider contacting your bank to ask them whether they fund fossil fuels. But that’s not all you can do. To take further positive action, keep on scrolling…
NOT_LISTED_DESC_1: *Bank.Green was founded on the belief that banks have had an easy time from their customers for too long*. Mass movements will pull us out of the climate crisis – and they’ll pull your bank out, too.
NOT_LISTED_DESC_2: Our mission is to encourage as many people as possible to take a stand - to refuse to let their money fuel environmental destruction any longer. Considering who you bank with, we think you probably agree. This is your chance to spread the word with us.
PLEDGE_TITLE: Let's send a message to the climate crisis funders that we won't tolerate their behavior
PLEDGE DESC_1: *Taking the Bank.Green pledge is a statement: the banking industry’s unsustainable financing activities are unacceptable and my money will not be a part of it.* By pledging to move your money away, you will:
PLEDGE DESC_2:
*We believe that tackling the climate crisis demands people power, so we’re building a movement.* Together, our combined pressure can change banking. The more names we have behind our pledge, the more likely we’ll succeed in getting banks to divest from fossil fuels.

*Our pledge includes a reminder function, so you can decide when we next contact you about sustainable banking options.* Currently stuck in a complicated mortgage? Want to talk to your current bank before you move your money? Too young to open a bank account? Just let us know when you want a nudge from Bank.Green.
PLEDGE_SEO_TITLE: Pledge to Switch Your Bank - Bank.Green
PLEDGE_SEO_DESC: Are you ready to switch to a sustainable bank and stop financing fossil fuels? Pledge and set a reminder for yourself.
NOT_OLD_ENOUGH: You must be older than 13 years old
PARTNERS_DESC: Our amazing partners at Bank.Green, together with whom we are reshaping finance.
PARTNERS_SUBTITLE: Below is a list of our amazing partners, together with whom we are reshaping finance.
COOKIE_MESSAGE: We use cookies to improve the site experience.
BANK_RATING_BAD_RAN_DESC: The good news is that your bank isn’t a leading fossil fuel funder. The bad news is that *it is still a fossil fuel funder.* According to the latest research,\* your bank may be considering cleaning up its funding activities – but not quickly enough. This means your bank might be willing to listen, so *it’s time to take positive action…*
BANK_RATING_GREAT_DESC:
Your money is definitely not funding the fossil fuel industry. We can’t be sure of everything that your bank is doing, but at least *your money is not enabling gas, oil, or coal extraction.*

We hope this makes you feel tremendous (boasting is encouraged), but don’t put your feet up just yet – *scroll down to discover the next step!*
BANK_RATING_UNK_TITLE: Sorry, we don’t know enough about your bank yet.
BANK_RATING_UNK_DESC: Unfortunately, we don’t yet have enough information on your bank to know what it’s funding. What we do know however, is that contacting your bank to ask them yourself will send a powerful message – banks will have no choice but to reassess socially irresponsible funding activities if they realize their customers are concerned. *To take positive action, keep on scrolling…*
THANKS_FOR_PLEDGING:
Thank you for your pledge!
Together we’ll build a better future for people and planet.
BANK_RATING_BAD_DESC_PARENT: {name} doesn't top the charts, but it’s still lending to fossil fuel companies and projects that are rapidly accelerating the climate crisis.
BANK_RATING_WORST_TITLE_PARENT: {name} is funding the climate crisis at an alarming rate.
BANK_RATING_WORST_DESC_PARENT: {name} is one of the 60 biggest funders of fossil fuels in the world. Since the Paris Agreement, the banks in this category have funneled $4.6 trillion into coal, oil and gas, rapidly accelerating the climate crisis.
BANK_DETAIL_EXPLAIN_1_PARENT:
While you’ve been stashing away money for a car, or a weekend get-away, that money has been helping to prop up *{name}*, which has been lending to some very questionable fossil fuel friends.

And it's not just a little here and there, we’re talking about *{total}* in the 6 years since 197 countries agreed to drastically reduce their greenhouse gas emissions in the Paris Agreement.
ETHICAL_BLURB: As a climate-conscious consumer, it's important to understand that where you choose to store your money can have an outsized impact on your carbon footprint. That's because most of the time, your money is not just sitting idly in your bank account, but it is being used to create loans for projects that can either harm or benefit the planet.
COMPARE_ETHICAL_TITLE: Find the Best Eco Banks In Your Area
BANK_RATING_BAD_RAN_DESC_PARENT: The good news is that {name} isn’t a leading fossil fuel funder. The bad news is that *it is still a fossil fuel funder.* According to the latest research,\* {name} may be considering cleaning up its funding activities – but not quickly enough. This means {name} might be willing to listen, so *it’s time to take positive action…*
THANKS_FOR_CONFIRMING: Thanks for joining the Money Movement and our emailing list!
AGREE_MARKETING: I wish to receive more information via email from Bank.Green.
HEAR_FROM_US_SOON: You'll be hearing from us soon!
JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Join our consumer action community to attend our Zoom workshops to take on fossil funding banks and discover other ways to divest from fossil fuels.
DID YOUR BANK SUPPORT THIS DEAL: Did Your Bank Support This Deal?
B_LAB_CITATION: CC BY-SA data partially from B-Lab
REMINDER: When would you like to be reminded?
WHEN_REMINDER: When would you like to be reminded to switch?
PLEDGE_FORM_TITLE: I pledge not to fund fossil fuels
BANK_NOT_FOUND:
We couldn't find your bank.
But that's ok! Just type in your bank's name and leave it at that.
PLEASE_AGREE_TO_MARKETING: You need to agree to receive marketing from Bank.Green
PLEDGE_POPUP_TITLE:
Not ready to switch banks today?
Take our pledge to move your money when you’re ready.
THANKS_PLEDGE_DESC: We’ll be in touch again when it’s time to move your money out of fossil banking.
PLEDGE_REMINDER: Thanks! We’ll be in touch again when it’s time to move your money out of fossil banking.
BANKS_LIVE_AND_DIE_ON_REPUTATIONS: *Banks live and die on their reputations.* Mass movements of money to fossil-free competitors puts those reputations at grave risk. By moving your money to a sustainable financial institution, you will:
SEND_A_MESSAGE_TO_YOUR_BANK: Send a message to your bank that it must defund fossil fuels
JOIN_A_FAST_GROWING_MOVEMENT: Join a fast-growing movement of consumers standing up for their future
TAKE_A_CRITICAL_CLIMATE_ACTION: Take a critical climate action with profound effects
BANKS_REQUIRE_PROFIT: Banks are companies that are required to make a profit. Right now, funding fossil fuels is profitable. Luckily for us, losing customers is not profitable. By pledging to move your money to a sustainable financial institution, you will:
LEARN_ABOUT_THE_ISSUES: Learn about the issues via our blog updates
JOIN_OUR_CAMPAIGNS_TAKE_ACTION: Join our campaigns to take action against fossil finance
DISCOVER_WAYS_TO_DIVEST: Discover other ways to divest from fossil fuels
MONEY_IS_THE_OXYGEN: We can’t say it better than environmentalist Bill McKibben: “Money is the oxygen on which the fire of global warming burns.” But don’t wait for the fire department to turn up – join us!
YOUVE_JUST_TAKEN_AN_AMAZING_ACTION:
You've just taken an amazing action to help build a better future for people and planet.

Why not encourage your friends to do the same...
I_JUST_PLEDGED_TO_MOVE_MY_MONEY: I just pledged to move my money away from fossil fuels! Check your bank and do the same
ETHICAL_BLURB_2: The environmental impact of this can often be far greater than that of other climate actions you might take, so it's critical to prevent this factor from working against your overall efforts to secure a better future. To help you to align your money with your values, below we are curating a constantly-updated list of financial institutions who are dedicated to offering sustainable banking services. Below the list, you can find frequently asked questions to help guide your choice.
WHAT_IS_FOSSIL_FREE_ALLIANCE_TITLE: What is the Fossil Free Alliance and how are these sustainable banks and cooperatives rated?
NO_COUNTRY_SELECTED_DESCRIPTION: To continue, please select a country.
